According to rule of post office, all backdrops will be sent by folded, so there may be some creases.
Here are ways to solve it:

(A)Roll it up tightly with a cylinder for 3-4 days, it will be okay.(B)Iron the back surface with steam iron but not dry iron, then it will be smooth again. (C)Hang up the product. Hang some items under it. Keep it in a tight status for 3-4 days.
